name: perl-mni-perllib

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: MNI Perl Library for scripting long-running scientific computations

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-getopt-tabular
dependencies.description:
Getopt::Tabular is a Perl 5 module for table-driven argument parsing,
vaguely inspired by John Ousterhout's Tk_ParseArgv.

dependencies.name: perl-text-format
dependencies.description: Text::Format - Various subroutines to format text
